tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserBehaviorPatterns (
 user_id INT,
 transaction_id INT,
 transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
 transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
 is_fraud BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    suspicious_behavior VARCHAR(100),
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_behavior(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	currency VARCHAR(10),
	source_user_id INT,
	destination_user_id INT,
	status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection_logs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	transaction_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	fraud_flag BOOLEAN,
	reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    account_balance DECIMAL(10,2),
    first_name VARCHAR(100),
    last_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE fraudulent_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    fraud_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    pattern_description TEXT,
    pattern_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_details (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL(18, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE account_activity_log (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    action VARCHAR(50),
    log_date TIMESTAMP
);
